sentences.sContent: All of this depends on certain assumptions and the meteorology, the geology and the hydrology of the area plus the contours of the land around this particular power plant.
sentences.sContent_eng: All of this depends on certain assumptions and the meteorology, the geology and the hydrology of the area plus the contours of the land around this particular power plant.
sentences.sCn: 所有的这些都是根据某些假设,和气象状态，地质情况，还有，水文请跨国,在加上土地的等高线,在这个特定的核能电站的周围。

words.tran: 流星；[气象] 大气现象

trans.tranOther: the scientific study of weather conditions
